replies.body: Thank you so much for that awesome featuring, Jynx! And big thanks to RiotGames! <3 You are the best! <3 <3 <3
Love the artwork the lamb and wolf picture it is uber cute!!!!
me too!

> [{quoted}](name=cupcake024,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=8b6mikib,comment-id=000000020003,timestamp=2015-12-30T19:04:04.487+0000)
>
> me too!

<3

Do you ever make up your own skin designs? Because I would be interested in seeing something that you come up with. You have the talent to make anything super cute. Maybe an adorable skin for league's hardest hearts, like Darius, Trynd, Morde
Indeed - I do! I have created some skins like Aviator Ahri or Mistletoe Soraka. And many more will follow! :) Thank you so much for your kind words! <3

I wish I could draw like you, i'm a terrible drawer and my best drawing is a dog but it just looks like a sausage on legs. (I'm being honest and it just pains me to even think of it.) When I get a little older, I want to make drawing characters from video games my life, but so far I am not getting anywhere. Keep up the good work though...

> [{quoted}](name=ninja9098,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=8b6mikib,comment-id=00000007,timestamp=2015-12-23T18:19:57.960+0000)
>
> I wish I could draw like you, i'm a terrible drawer and my best drawing is a dog but it just looks like a sausage on legs. (I'm being honest and it just pains me to even think of it.) When I get a little older, I want to make drawing characters from video games my life, but so far I am not getting anywhere. Keep up the good work though...

Thank you so much for your kind words - and just keep practicing! As long as it is fun, never give up and you can surely do it! And hey, maybe your sausage-dog is funny and great for a comic! ;)
logged on to downvote...
Same..
Haha! :)
Love the Mistletoe Janna and Aviator Ahri, and the Kindred one. You are very talented!!

I saw your work long ago in facebook posts, I just came here from LAS 'cos the forum is WAY BETTER, and see this here :D. I'm happy to meet the person behind all those beautiful drawings. 
Would I see someday a drawing of my beautiful Akali and my gorgeous Syndra togheter :D? Maybe just my stunning Akali ♥? ('cos that snow style Syndra u drew satisfied me 100% :3.

--
>Kind regards. {{champion:134}}{{item:3211}}{{champion:84}}
Love your work, so awesome.
like 1v1 me im not faker me doublelift like omg 1v1 me
PLease- I want that Christmas {{champion:16}} skin please {{item:2050}} {{item:2050}}
Awwww, I am so glad you like her! <3

> [{quoted}](name=CaramelxFrappe,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=8b6mikib,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-12-21T21:35:53.547+0000)

Either that or elderwood Soraka.

I think any Soraka skin would be most appreciated at this point, as long as it was very creative looking.
I've seen this Christmas design of Soraka somewhere else, and it's something Riot really needs to consider making into a reality.

Please Riot? I main {{champion:16}}, give her the loving she deserves if you guys are up for it.

> [{quoted}](name=DrDeath14,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=8b6mikib,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-12-21T21:40:45.349+0000)

You gotta admit its an adorable teemo ha
its so..... anime......
as an artist, i have to say.. shes shading and i cannot find a light source. she just goes at it and its honestly annoying
Haha, I guess I use a very unique type of shading. I love concept art so my style is going that way! ;)
You are a wonderful person, taking criticism so positively! You just made my day.
she sells prints on Etsy... i know because i have 2 =)
Oh good! Another artist that I can f--... uhm. Yeah, gj. yay. :D

> [{quoted}](name=PixTron,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=8b6mikib,comment-id=001d,timestamp=2015-12-22T00:06:15.145+0000)

Please don't feature such a person... She only plays... ARAM shivers* euhhhh

Amazing how she's Gold IV if she only plays ARAM............ Negative comments aren't needed here. euhhhh.... 
She is a wonderful artist and PERSON. THE END
just one word:DON'T GET FOOLED BY TEEMO'S LOOK. HE'S A DEMON
Oh my goodness, i love the kindred one SO MUCH. Kindred is probably my main ATM.   Also, i was wondering if you had any other drawings of Ahri....she is my waifu <3  {{champion:103}}
look at your name.. and then look at mine :l {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
I fail to see the relevance between the two.

Logged in just to say I would love it if you made the hotest/most adorable Ashe i've ever seen pls. Elise too. <3 waifus {{champion:60}} {{champion:22}}

Also Tahm would be cool too.
Check out my gallery on FB or Deviantart - I have already created some Ashes & Elise. Maybe there is just the right waifu for you! ;) <3

Jokes aside, the art is great! I wish I could draw a straight line, much less stuff like this.
No scratches on Ahri's face?

I had to sign in to comment... your chibis are too cute! Dx And that Janna as well <3 Found out you sell theses on Etsy.. I'm going to have to buy one soon! Question about that too, are the Christmas skin editions only during this time of the year or can we request any time?
